text: Tonna Hospital () is a psychiatric hospital in Tonna, Neath, Wales. It is managed by Swansea Bay University Health Board. ==History== The hospital was officially opened as Neath District Isolation Hospital in March 1939. It joined the National Health Service as a children's hospital in 1948 and subsequently became a psychiatric hospital. ==References== Category:Psychiatric hospitals in Wales Category:Hospitals established in 1939 Category:Hospital buildings completed in 1939 Category:Hospitals in Neath Port Talbot Category:Swansea Bay University Health Board
